summary: Defines a configurable ResNet module that builds standard residual network variants (e.g., 18, 34, 50, 101, 152 layers) using convolutional and bottleneck blocks with global average pooling, intended for 224×224 image inputs within the NeMo multimodal speech‑CV toolkit.
business_intent: Offers a ready‑to‑use deep residual network component for developers building speech and computer‑vision models, enabling rapid integration of proven image classification backbones into NeMo pipelines.
